name: iMo Controller
overview:
iMo transforms your iPhone/iPod Touch into a PC game controller. This is a really neat way to play PC video games (instead of using your PC’s boring old keyboard/mouse). Drive your race car, shoot down enemies, bomb fighter planes and a lot more using iMo!

iMo leverages the iPhone/iPod Touchâ€™s built-in accelerometer and touch screen to not just mimic the standard game controllers such as the joystick but add a lot more control to take gaming action to the next level.
